WSO2 Governance Registry - User Guide
Extensions
There are 3 types of extensions that you can add to the Registry.
Handlers
Filters
Aspects
Details on these extensions can be found in Governance Registry Developer's Guide
Installing Extensions
In the navigator, under Extensions, click Add
Add extension interface can be used to install extensions to the Governance Registry. Simply upload the JAR file containing the extension using the file uploader.
Figure 1 : Add extension user interface
Listing Extensions
In the navigator, under Extensions, click List.
List extensions interface can be used to list extensions added to the Governance Registry. It also provides a way to remove installed extensions.
Figure 2 : List extensions user interface
